title: Giro d’Italia Stage 1: Pedersen Denies Van Aert for Stage Win and Pink Jersey with Monster Sprint
content:
Gee, Arensman both lose time in explosive hilly finale of Giro d'Italia stage 1, Landa taken away in ambulance after horror crash.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 1: Pedersen Denies Van Aert for Stage Win and Pink Jersey with Monster Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
